name: 2008 Final Four Quiz | NCAA Basketball | 10 Questions

questions.text: The 2008 March Madness saw the Final Four made up of all number one seeded teams.  How many times had this happened before?
questions.explanation:
0.

	This is the first time that all 4 #1 seeds made the the Final Four, since the seeding process began in 1979.

questions.text: How many points was North Carolina down at halftime against Kansas?
questions.explanation:
17.

	At the largest lead, Kansas was up by 23 points with a 33-10 score.  In the second half, North Carolina cut that lead down to only five points.

questions.text: How long did North Carolina go without a basket in the first half against Kansas?
questions.explanation:
9:03.

	This was the longest amount of time North Carolina had gone all season without a basket.

questions.text: Which two freshman faced off in the Final 4 against each other?
questions.explanation:
Kevin Love and Derrick Rose.

	Kevin Love played for UCLA.  Derrick Rose and Memphis put the Bruins down 78-63.

questions.text: How many points did UCLA freshman Kevin Love score against Memphis?
questions.explanation:
12.

	Chris Douglas-Roberts of Memphis led all scorers with 28 points.  Russell Westbrook scored 22 points.

questions.text: Memphis had 37 wins in the season after they defeated UCLA in the Final 4.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Duke, UNLV, and Illinois were the three other teams that had 37 wins upon completion of the Final Four.  These three teams did not win the National Championship.

questions.text: Joey Dorsey had 12 points and 19 rebounds in the game against UCLA in the Final Four?
questions.explanation:
False.

	Joey Dorsey of the Memphis Tigers had 0 points and 15 rebounds.  This was the most abnormal stat of the night.

questions.text: In the game against Memphis, UCLA was down by how many points at halftime?
questions.explanation:
3.

	UCLA was down 38-35 at the end of the first half.

questions.text: 2008 was the fifth consecutive season that UCLA lost in the Final Four?
questions.explanation:
False.

	That was the third straight season that UCLA lost in the Final Four.  They lost to Florida in both 2006 and 2007.

questions.text: What was the final score of the UCLA vs Memphis Final Four match?
questions.explanation:
Memphis 78-63.

	UCLA ended up falling short once again in their third straight Final Four appearance.  They lost to Florida twice in the past two years.  Memphis won by 15 points.
